title: Ep 176 | Phil Says There's No Hope in the Democratic Party, Jesus' 'Test Runs' & God the Mind-Bender
description:
Phil and Al tell hilarious stories of their limited aptitude for any technology that has more than a switch. They also get into Jesus' resume, understanding the mind-bending relationship between the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit, and why there's no hope in the Democratic Party. And Al points to a few parts of the Old Testament that could suggest Jesus had a few "test runs" before he was born to Mary. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
